data.name: The Legend of Tianding: Prequel Comic
data.detailed_description:
Experience the event before the dramatic saga of The Legend of Tianding in this official prequel comic!
Witness the training!
Experience the failures!
Who will win in man versus bear? There’s only one way to find out!



Art by Denim
Story by Maso
